{"file":"third_party/managed/README.md","purpose":"Captures metadata about externally managed dependencies.","exports":[],"depends_on":["third_party"],"notes":["resolved_via_vcpkg_or_system","glfw_drop_in_supported","assimp_oidn_drop_in_supported"]}
<!-- Human Summary -->
Managed directory documents integration points for dependencies supplied by vcpkg, system packages, or similar tooling. Optional drop-in subtrees exist for `glfw/`, `assimp/`, and `openimagedenoise/` when local installs are unavailable.
